html:
5.1.17  6:51 am   Why can't the moon be square?

     because it was made from a spinning mess of rocks, and gravity

5.1.17  6:39 am   how big is your cucumber

     i don't have any cucumbers

5.1.17  6:12 am   Will the new video be the best thing I've seen in my whole life?

     i've tried my best

5.1.17  5:55 am   What is your favourite cactus species?

     i'm not familiar with any of them

5.1.17  3:48 am   what would you do if you were me and wanted to see hotewig as soon after its release as possible?

     what would you do if you were me and you wanted to release it as soon as possible

5.1.17  3:40 am   What the heck am I supposed to do about the current state of America?

     it depends what your job title is

5.1.17  3:33 am   Can you justify capitalism in three words?

     it sells itself

5.1.17  3:29 am   What keeps you alive bill?

     i'm not sure

5.1.17  2:32 am   Is Lenin in the new video

     he was already in an instagram

5.1.17  2:18 am   do you ever have to force yourself to have creative ideas or do they usually just flow from you?

     it depends what i need it for
5.1.17  2:16 am   what's a good adjective to base my next poem on?

5.1.17  1:30 am   what is the correct and socially acceptable reaction to facing a bleak, single and loveless future?

     become a scientist

5.1.17  1:24 am   do you think that there are more disadvantages than advantages when it comes to putting labels on different parts of your identity?

     i don't really think it's even possible to divide your identity cleanly into different parts

5.1.17  1:07 am   Are you working on anything else besides the new video?

     no

5.1.17  12:54 am   you sure answer a lot of questions

     i guess you're right

5.1.17  12:03 am   how can one not be cliche?

     negotiate with anyone who calls you cliche, and convince them not to call you that

5.1.17  12:00 am   Will this be the first question you answer on the May 2017 questions page?

     ah, yes. nice job with this





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

4.30.17  11:58 pm   hello my good man bill. how is the new video coming alone

     wild and crazy

     what part are you at? still on the jingles?

     all the major tasks are done. just fixing a long list of very small things
4.30.17  11:51 pm   how big is your dick?

4.30.17  11:34 pm   Salamander?

     no this is bill. i think salamander might have a different site

4.30.17  11:18 pm   is hotewig out yet?

     no
4.30.17  11:07 pm   When's hotewig coming out

4.30.17  11:06 pm   Which highway is your favourite, I like the one to hell and the one to the danger zone

     lovely stretch of the
4.30.17  10:51 pm   What percentage of completion would you say hot twig/ the new history video is at now?

4.30.17  10:50 pm   do you think you have a good work ethic?

     oh hell yeah

4.30.17  10:37 pm   because vine went under has it been "easier" to concentrate on bigger projects? (not necessarily less stressful)

     i already mostly transitioned away from vine about a year before it was cancelled

4.30.17  10:34 pm   why do you like pretzels?

     because they are bland, cumbersome, and tasteless

4.30.17  10:31 pm   what is the thing you enjoyed learning about the most for hotewig?

     the beginning, which i actually kind of made up. which is ok because i think it actually was made up

4.30.17  10:13 pm   would you ever do a meet &greet

     meet, not greet

4.30.17  10:13 pm   how is your mental health?

     fine, good, etc

      I am worried for it because of the building pressure and hype of hotewig, it must be interfering a bit with your personal and social life.

     i don't have any

4.30.17  10:11 pm   do you ever think about working on long projects slowly while also producing short ones? or does that make you unmotivated to work on the long ones?

     i used to do that. but then people got raging mad at me. i guess they thought i was 'not doing a long project'

4.30.17  9:57 pm   has any of the content in HOTEWIG occurred after the time you started working on the project?

     not yet

4.30.17  9:48 pm   What's your favorite birdsong?

     the quack

4.30.17  9:44 pm   do you think acrylic paint is cool

     i'm not really familiar with it

4.30.17  9:30 pm   cmon bill answer my question why are you doing this to me

     doing what

4.30.17  9:27 pm   approximately how long does the "drop crazy hints" stage last. or have we been in it this entire time

     i've been doing it for quite a while

4.30.17  9:23 pm   if you are traveling in a car at one half the speed of light and you turn on the headlights, how fast will the light appear to move to somebody who is not moving relative to you?

     not at all

4.30.17  9:21 pm   I'm really proud of you for making another video at your pace and because you want to.

     i am not, i actually wish i could make it much faster. but i am already making it as fast as i physically can

4.30.17  9:18 pm   will my question get answered

     maybe
4.30.17  9:04 pm   why do you answer our questions
4.30.17  8:53 pm   ?cna i aks a ueqstion.

4.30.17  8:40 pm   How soon until the new video?

     i already started it. actually i started it before my previous video was even released
4.30.17  8:39 pm   how do you have time to answer all of these questions?
4.30.17  8:26 pm   are you a real person?

4.30.17  6:19 pm   i feel a feeling

     ah, that's classic

4.30.17  6:14 pm   Is northwest real?

     i think so

4.30.17  5:59 pm   What's the next history lesson going to be on?

     i can't tell you

4.30.17  5:57 pm   On a scale of 1 to 24 how much time in a given day do you spend contemplating the struggle of the common honey bee?

     0

4.30.17  5:36 pm   can you be my life coach?

     i will try

4.30.17  5:30 pm   Est Canada mieux que l'Amerique?

     you will have to compare and contrast them yourself
